Your password unlocks your Recovery key

Your data is only readable through a chain of decryption operations that begins with your master encryption key, which we store encrypted with your password. This means that if you lose your password, your Recovery key can no longer be decrypted, and you can no longer decrypt your data.
Exporting the Recovery key and keeping it in a secure location enables you to set a new password without data loss.
An external attacker cannot gain access to your account with just your key. A password reset requires both the key and access to your email.
Copy the Recovery key to the clipboard or save it as text file.
Recovery key copied to clipboard. Save it to a safe place where you can easily access later.
This is the last step to delete your account. You will permanently lose all the data stored in the cloud. Please enter your password below.
Please check your email to proceed.
An error occurred, please try again.
You must be logged in to perform this action.
You need to be logged in to complete your email change. Please log in again with your current email address, then tap on your confirmation link again.

Please enter your Recovery key below

This is the last step to park your account, please enter your new password. Your data will be retained for at least 60 days. If you recall your parked account’s password, please contact support@mega.nz

Your Recovery key will be used to reset your password. Please enter your new password.

Protects your chat with zero-knowledge encryption, providing essential safety assurances:
The system ensures that the data received is truly from the specified sender, and its content has not been manipulated during transit.

Enhance the MEGA Chat experience. URL content will be retrieved without zero-knowledge encryption.
Two-factor authentication is a second layer of security for your account.
Why do you need two-factor authentication?

Two-factor authentication is a second layer of security for your account. Which means that even if someone knows your password they cannot access it, without also having access to the 6-digit code only you have access to.
Scan or copy the seed to your authenticator app.
Be sure to back up this seed to a safe place in case you lose your device.
Please enter the 6-digit code generated by your authenticator app.
An error occurred generating the seed or QR code, please try again.
Next time you log in to your account you will be asked to enter a 6-digit code provided by your authenticator app.
Please save your recovery key in a safe location, to avoid issues in case you lose access to your app, or if you want to disable two-factor authentication.

Change settings to choose which screen opens when you launch the MEGA app.
MEGA does not support image insertion here

Our file versioning feature ensures that we keep older copies of your files around if you replace them with newer versions. If you disable File Versioning you will no longer have this protection; the old copy will be lost when you replace it.
Please enter a valid file or folder link
Please enter a valid chat link
You have pasted a chat link.
You have pasted a contact link.
Use mobile data to preview high resolution images
Allow the use of mobile data to load high resolution images when previewing. If disabled, the original image will only be loaded when you zoom in.
You are deleting your backups folder. This will remove all the backups you have set. Are you sure you want to do this?
Please type “%1s” to confirm this action
To ensure these items added to your backup folder are automatically synchronised to the MEGA Cloud, please set them up in the MEGA Desktop App.
This folder can only be shared as read-only; as this is a backup folder, any changes to its content could disable the backup.

Items in this folder are part of a configured backup and are synchronised to a local folder. Taking this action will break the synchronisation and disable the backup. The backup can be re-enabled in the MEGA Desktop App. Are you sure you want to proceed?
These folders can only be shared as read-only; as they are backup folders, any changes to their content could disable the backups.
Some folders shared are backup folders and read-only. Do you wish to continue?
You already have a subscription. If you buy another one you will be charged twice. To avoid this, cancel your current subscription through %1$s. Visit our Help Centre for more information.

You already have a subscription. If you buy another one you will be charged twice. To avoid this, cancel your current subscription from your iTunes account. Visit our Help Centre for more information.

You already have a subscription. If you buy another one, you will be charged twice. To avoid this, cancel your current subscription by going to MEGA in a desktop or mobile web browser. Visit our Help Centre for more information.
Go to Settings to grant MEGA permission to access your nearby devices using Bluetooth.
We are unable to proceed with the billing. If you are using a dual app, please consider logging in to MEGA without it. If not, try to upgrade through your web browser.
You have an active MEGA subscription with %1$s. You must cancel it separately via %2$s, as MEGA is not able to cancel it for you. Visit our Help Centre for more information.
You have an active MEGA subscription. It will be canceled automatically after the account is deleted. Visit our Help Centre for more information.
You have an active MEGA subscription with Apple. You must cancel it separately from your iTunes account, as MEGA is not able to cancel it for you. Visit our Help Centre for more information.
This is the last step to delete your account. Both your account and subscription will be deleted and you will permanently lose all your stored data. Please enter your password below.
File format is not supported. Cannot open the file.
The selected folder is empty. No files to upload.
You have entered your current password
File removed as it violated our Terms of Service.
This device doesn’t have an app to select folders.
Open unsupported file types in third-party apps
Unsupported files types will be opened in third-party apps instead of the MEGA app.
Send optimised images when on mobile data but original size images when on Wi-Fi.
Transfers have been paused. Resume them to proceed with the download.
Please do not close the application.
Transfers not yet processed will be cancelled.
A file named [B]%1$s[/B] already exists at this destination.
Select the file you want to keep
Select whether you want to merge the folders
The current version of the file will be replaced with the file you are uploading.
The file will be updated with version history:
The file you are uploading will be renamed as:
Replace the file in the destination folder with the file you are moving.
The file you are moving will be renamed as:
Replace the file in the destination folder with the file you are copying.
The file you are copying will be renamed as:
Merge the folder at the destination with the folder you are copying.
Merge the folder at the destination with the folder you are moving.
Merge the folder at the destination with the folder you are uploading.
No files will be changed. You will keep the file below:
A folder named [B]%1$s[/B] already exists at this destination.
Call will automatically end in 2 mins unless you want to stay on it.
Your feedback helps us improve MEGA. Please clearly describe the issue you’ve experienced. The more details you provide, the easier it will be for us to resolve it.
No internet connection. Check your connection and try again.
Something went wrong. Please try again later. If you still can’t submit the issue, contact %s for assistance.
We have received your report. We’ll look into the issue and get back to you.
This file type isn’t supported. To open the file, download it first.
This will end the call for all participants.
You’re the only host on the call. Do you want to assign another one before leaving?
[A]%1$s[/A][B] was changed to a standard participant by [/B][A]%2$s[/A]
[A]%1$s[/A][B] was changed to host role by [/B][A]%2$s[/A]
%1$s was changed to a standard participant by %2$s
%1$s was changed to host role by %2$s
Chat securely and privately, with anyone and on any device, knowing that no one can read your chats, not even MEGA.
Hear a sound when someone joins or leaves a call.
File not saved to Cloud drive. Try again.
MEGA will send you call, chat, and file transfer notifications.

This is where your backed up files and folders are stored. Your backed up items are “read-only” to protect them from being accidentally modified in your Cloud drive.\nYou can back up items from your computer to MEGA using our desktop app.

Your MEGA account has been suspended due to repeated allegations of copyright infringements. This means you cannot access your account or data within it.\nCheck our email for more information on how to file a counter-notice.
Your account was terminated due to a breach of MEGA’s Terms of Service.\nYou will not be able to regain access to your stored data or be authorised to register a new MEGA account.
Thank you for your Pro Lite monthly subscription
Thank you for your Pro Lite yearly subscription
Thank you for your Pro I monthly subscription
Thank you for your Pro I yearly subscription
Thank you for your Pro II monthly subscription
Thank you for your Pro II yearly subscription
Thank you for your Pro III monthly subscription
Thank you for your Pro III yearly subscription
You have no contacts to add to this chat. If you want to add participants, first invite them to your contact list.
You’ve already added all your contacts to this chat. If you want to add more participants, first invite them to your contact list.
Saved image to your device gallery
This album name is not allowed. Enter a different name.
An album with this name already exists. Enter a different name.
Automatically open folders that contain only images and videos in media discovery view. This lets you see media in gallery mode and filter by date.
As this folder contains only images and videos, we’ve automatically opened it in media discovery view. This lets you see media in gallery mode and filter by date. You can disable this in Settings.
Anyone with this link can join the meeting and view the meeting chat.

plurals.name: photos_album_delete_confirmation_description
plurals.item: Album will be deleted but its contents will stay in your Timeline.
Albums will be deleted but their contents will stay in your Timeline.

resources.string: To access the shared folder, the person who shared it with you should verify you, too.
To enable camera uploads, grant MEGA access to your photos and other media on your device.
[A]%s [/A][B]invited you to a meeting scheduled for:[/B]
[A]%s updated[/A][B] the meeting name from “%s” to [/B]“[A]%s[/A]”
[A]%s updated[/A][B] the details of the meeting scheduled for:[/B]
You denied MEGA access to your device’s storage and media files. If you’d like to continue sharing, allow MEGA permission.
[A]%s [/A][B]invited you to a recurring meeting scheduled for:[/B]
[A]%s updated[/A][B] the details of the recurring meeting scheduled for:[/B]
[A]%s cancelled[/A][B] the meeting and all its occurrences[/B]
This link hasn’t been generated with the account you’re currently logged into. Log in to the account related to this link to verify your email address.

resources.string: We’re upgrading your account’s security. You should see this message only once. If you’ve seen it before, first make sure it has been for this account and not for another MEGA account you have.\n\nIf you’re sure and it’s the second time you’re seeing this message for this account, stop using this account.
You can add only up to 150 items at a time to an album.
You can’t verify %s as they’re not in your contact list. Wait for them to accept your invitation first.
This file has been taken down in accordance with our [A]Takedown Guidance Policy[/A].
This folder has been taken down in accordance with our [A]Takedown Guidance Policy[/A].
Notify me when someone invites me to a meeting
Notify me 15 minutes before the meetings starts and on the time the meeting is schedule to start
The decryption key has been exported and will be shared with the link.

plurals.name: album_share_remove_links_dialog_body
plurals.item: People you shared this link with will lose access to the album.
People you shared these links with will lose access to the albums.

resources.string: To access the album, enter the decryption key. If you don’t have it, contact the person who shared the link with you.

plurals.name: meetings_schedule_meeting_recurrence_monthly_description
plurals.item: Some months don’t have %1$d day. For these months, the occurrence will be scheduled for the last day of the month.
Some months don’t have %1$d days. For these months, the occurrence will be scheduled for the last day of the month.

resources.string: This folder has been taken down in accordance with our [A]Takedown Guidance Policy[/A]. You can dispute this takedown if you believe we’ve made a mistake.
This file has been taken down in accordance with our [A]Takedown Guidance Policy[/A]. You can dispute this takedown if you believe we’ve made a mistake.
The link to the album has been removed or the album has been deleted. Contact the person who shared the link with you.
Choose the right plan for you
Save up to 16% with yearly billing
• Rewind up to 90 days on Pro Lite and up to 365 days on Pro I, II, and III (coming soon)
• Schedule rubbish bin clearing between 7 days and 10 years
Only people with the password can open the link
Are you sure you want to clear the full message history of this meeting?
An album named “%1$s” already exists in your Albums. Enter a new name for the album you’re saving.
You can upgrade your current subscription on our [A]pricing page.[/A]

plurals.name: cloud_drive_subtitle_links_access_user
plurals.item: Anyone with this link can view and download your data
Anyone with these links can view and download your data

resources.string: “%1$s” can’t be saved to Cloud drive. Try again later and if the problem continues, contact the person who shared the link with you.

plurals.name: general_snackbar_link_created_and_copied
plurals.item: Link created and copied to your clipboard
Links created and copied to your clipboard

resources.string: You already have a recurring subscription for this plan
You don’t have enough storage to save this album to your Cloud drive. Upgrade now to get more storage.
Talk securely and privately on audio or video calls with friends and colleagues around the world.
This meeting will be archived and all participants will be notified.
This meeting will be placed under Past meetings and all participants will be notified.
Only this occurrence will be cancelled. All the other occurrences will go ahead as scheduled.
This is the only occurrence of the recurring meeting. Cancelling this occurrence will cancel the meeting.\nIf cancelled, the meeting will be archived and all participants will be notified.

This is the only occurrence of the recurring meeting. Cancelling this occurrence will cancel the meeting.\nIf cancelled, the meeting will be placed under Past meetings and all participants will be notified.
This meeting and all its occurrences will be archived and all participants will be notified.
This meeting and all its occurrences will be placed under Past meetings and all participants will be notified.
You can now schedule one-off and recurring meetings.
You can start the meeting before its scheduled time by tapping [A]Start meeting[/A] in the meeting room.
You can view, cancel, or edit any occurrence of a recurring meeting by tapping the three dots on the right and selecting [A]Occurrences[/A].
Email a calendar invite to participants so they can add the meeting to their calendars.

We protect your data with zero-knowledge encryption so all the information you store, share, and receive on MEGA is secure. To ensure extra security, we ask you to verify the contacts you share information with or receive data from.
To verify your contact, ensure the credentials you see above match their account credentials. You can ask them to share their credentials with you.
Only participants admitted by the host can join the meeting.
Participants added by non-hosts during calls won’t be sent to the waiting room.

Some of the contacts you’re sharing information with haven’t been verified by you. To ensure extra security, we recommend that you verify their credentials in Contacts. Tap on the three dots next to the contact you want to verify and tap Info.
An update has just been downloaded
Wait for host to start the meeting
Wait for host to let you in

%s is shared by a contact you haven’t verified. To ensure extra security, we recommend that you verify their credentials in Contacts. Tap on the three dots next to the contact you want to verify and tap Info.
%1$s is waiting to join the call.

plurals.name: meetings_waiting_room_admit_users_to_call_dialog_message
plurals.item: %1$d participant is waiting to join the call.
%1$d participants are waiting to join the call.

resources.string: You’ll be removed from the waiting room.
There was no response to your request to join the meeting. You’ll be removed from the waiting room. Try joining again later.
Images and videos from subfolders will also be included in the media discovery view when the main folder is in this view
